title: Bay Village father accidentally shoots himself, 10-year-old son while cleaning gun
content:
BAY VILLAGE, Ohio - A Bay Village man accidentally shot himself and his 10-year-old son Saturday while cleaning his semiautomatic handgun, police said.
The 36-year-old man and his son suffered non-life-threatening injuries about 8:30 p.m. at a house on Osborn Road, police said.
Investigators are reviewing the incident and have not said whether the father will face criminal charges.
The bullet hit the father's hand and grazed the son's left torso, police said.
Paramedics took both to a local hospital for treatment.
